report.title: Get Beautiful
report.author: Becky
report.bodytext: Get Beautiful /n /n Closer, /n Minds open easy- /n get beautiful, /n more useful, if flowers grow /n in the unconsious. /n Serenity siezes you quickly /n impaling your evils, /n holding them to a clearer light /n which causes hate to dissipate. /n /n It's time to reconsider, /n time to renegotiate- /n reality, /n as a whole /n And then with eyes fully open /n maybe the mind dances naturally. /n Like colors that breath, /n the same as i do /n when ever sleep brings struggle, /n and then sanity. /n /n Believe- /n you are divine, /n concieve now /n all anger benign. /n Within the world where peace pulses /n through my body. /n /n Endlessly, /n or ten minutes that comes in the pretence of forever. /n Without malignance, /n with holding reason- /n and still nothing at all. /n /n With passion that makes you alive /n and god inside of you, /n glorifying your mind /n and limbs /n and nerves. /n through spasms of shiva /n flowing always in you. /n Realize your breath- /n get beautiful. /n /n /n yeah, i think i liked it.
